attributes.action: Create a direct link between the CBI and eduction policies
attributes.additional_details: The recent CBI report gives an alarming insight into the massive shortfall of young people with the core skillsets required for current an industry.  The CBI should be allowed more influence to ensure that our education system is capable of providing the people that our industries require.  An additional benefit would be that educational establishments can make extensive cost savings by not providing worthless courses, thus reducing student fees.
